#+BEGIN_SRC sage :session . :exports both
# bn128
q=21888242871839275222246405745257275088696311157297823662689037894645226208583
Fq=GF(q)
E = EllipticCurve(Fq, [0,3])
G = E(1,2)

a=2
b=3

A=a*G
B=b*G
A
B

# A + B == (a+b)*G

num = 10
den = 2

a*G + b*G == (Fq(num) * Fq(den)**(-1)) * G
#+END_SRC
